website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon Coolpix L810 offers a lot of specs at a low price. If you need fast shooting performance, though, you'll need to spend more money.
pros: The Nikon Coolpix L810 is an inexpensive 26x megazoom point-and-shoot that's easy to use and runs on AA batteries
cons: The L810 performs poorly in low light and indoors without a flash, and its shooting performance is slow, as is its autofocus

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Camera!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this item the morning of a big concert we were attending. Was concerned that I wouldn't have enough time to familiarize myself fully with functions/features available. The instruction booklet is well written and easy to follow, plus being the owner of a Nikon CoolPix made this easier to set up, as the primary settings are almost identical. This camera takes wonderful pictures, especially with the zoom. Made our concert experience one of the best we've attended, and we have so many professional looking photos to prove that. I am not a photography buff, so am particularly pleased with the ease of operation. Highly recommend this item to anyone wanting crisp photos without needed an encyclopedia to decipher the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: S A

customer_reviews.title: nikon coolpix l810
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASE THE NIKON DIGITAL CAMERA AFEW MONTHS AGO. I HAD A KODAK EASYSHARE DIGITAL CAMERA FOR 15 YEARS SO I THOUGHT IT WAS TIME FOR A NEW CAMERA . I WAS VERY DISAPPOINTED IN THE NIKON CAMERA , OUT OF THE 50 PICTURES I HAVE TAKEN ONLY ABOUT 10 COME OUT CLEAR , THE OTHER PICTURES WERE BLURRY AND RED. THE LENS SHUTTER WOULD NOT WORK PROPERLY,KEEP GETTING STUCK. I WENT BACK TO USING MY KODAK CAMERA . IF I PURCHASE ANOTHER CAMERA IT WON'T BE NIKON. WHEN I RETURNED THE NIKON CAMERA I WAS CHARGED $37.50 ON RESTOCK FEE PLUS SHIPPING , THAT COME TO ALMOST FIFTY DOLLARS .
customer_reviews.author: B.r.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a new camera and I thought the color red was awesome but much to my surprise I took 50 pictures the first time and last time I used it and 30 were blurry, these were inside with the flash on. I like the button to put the flash up as my Kodak's flash is always up. I don't like that the batteries and scan disc were in the same compartment and it was hard t open and close. I didn't think it has a smooth zoom out and the side zoom I didn't like as much as the top one. The camera is a nice size and weight but it's not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda Watts

customer_reviews.title: unimpressed.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this camera. I was so excited to find this camera, a Nikon no less, and eagerly anticipated it's arrival. When it arrived, I devoured the owner's manual, and set it up. First negative, it feels cheap. Lightweight plastic, with an especially flimsy battery case. Taking pictures, I noticed that it is slow to respond, slow to focus, and the images are not as clean and crisp as expected. Got that feeling immediately that I had made a bad purchase and sent it back. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kara O

customer_reviews.title: Excellent zoom, does not always focus properly in some ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent zoom, does not always focus properly in some situations so you might have to take a few pictures. This camera is a great value - good camera for the money. Image resolution is excellent. Original files are very large. Use Nikon Transfer 2 to load them onto Windows or Mac (I have done both and it is easy) and you also have the option of storing them in the cloud for free through Nikon Image Space.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I can't say much more than that this is a substandard camera. Looks professional, but doesn't take good pictures without a lot of effort. You'd need a very immobile subject and great outdoor lighting to get a decent photo. After a few months, all of the text on the menu bars stopped showing on the screen and I cannot figure out why.
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: I liked this camera when I purchased it 2012
customer_reviews.text: I liked this camera when I purchased it 2012, even though I didn't see that it did not have a viewfinder when I checked it out on line.. The LCD screen is barely readable in sunlight. A year later it has ceased to work completely. I have tried many batteries, but it will no longer power up. It may be something I did to it, but I'm looking for another camera with a viewfinder. It did take fine photos.
customer_reviews.author: Secreto

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting this camera for a very long time and finally gave in to purchasing it when it went on sale. I'm so glad I did. I have to get used to carrying around a larger camera but it takes such beautifully clear pictures. What I love the most is that you can get an awesome shot from so far away. Also, using the zoom feature I never have issues taking window pictures... even when there is dirt on the window, the camera zooms right past it to the money shot.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera.
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a lot of abilities to be so compact. It has the look of a SLR camera but not the feel. When you hold it like a SLR camera it just does fit into you hand that well, its too small. Also there is not view finder (which I knew when I bought it) but still worth mentioning, because the image looks blurry on the screen. Most of the time it turns out fine, but not all the time. It is very difficult to see in the sun as well. Overall a great family camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gemms

customer_reviews.title: No manual focus option
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I should have read reviews from other sites on this camera before purchasing it at Amazon.I was really looking for a function that would allow me manually focus for that professional look - the "oomph factor". This camera did not provide that function. Also, it did not come with a carrying case. On the good side, it came with four batteries (non rechargeable) and it really does take good quality pictures - although I bet I could have done the same thing with another camera half its size. Delivery was also quick!
customer_reviews.author: Deidre

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: I had concerns about this camera after reading reviews from photography sites. But with lots of features , a very reasonable price,good looks & its a Nikon I decide to give it a try . I think it makes very good pictures and is easy to use . You don't have to know much about cameras to take good pictures . Works good for taking up close pictures from a distance (school graduations,music concerts & vacation shots). I am very happy with this camera,it is the best camera I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied, overall
customer_reviews.text: It took some getting used to after being accustomed to looking through a view finder, and no longer having the option. Completely satisfied with the quality of the shots, even though multiple frames are often required to get just the right one. Probably not the camera to use for action photos or 'must have' events such as weddings until completely familiar with the focusing.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy C

customer_reviews.title: camera features
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying my new camera that I recently purchased. It came with a charger, a user's guide, and other useful materials. In addition, I love that the camera has a cover for its lens to protect it, and the device has great graphics and high quality zooming. I would highly recommend friends and family to purchase this camera and other products from EzCorp on Amazon. The camera came in excellent condition! What an awesome device!!! Kindly regards, Natasha M.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Natasha M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my mom as a gift for my sister for Christmas. The smile on her face was priceless. Not to mention the fact that my brother wanted a camera for Christmas also and got the same camera. It was a true kodak moment to see them open the boxes and pull out a camera and it was exactly what they wanted. I'm still seeing flashing lights from all the pictures they have taken.
customer_reviews.author: Likely Author

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great camera! It's well designed and fairly easy to operate, especially for a digital camera. It takes a fantastic photo if you have it on the right setting. Take the time to learn how to use it, famialiarize yourself with the instructions and you'll be fine. The only thing I would change about it is the flash should pop up automaticly, not need to be manually lifted. Otherwise i'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: I settled for this
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this expecting it to be completely different (wish I could've seen the back) but I decided to keep it because returning would have been way to much work for me in my situation. As a result I haven't used it and I'm prepared to resell it. Love nikon cameras though. Make sure you google this model so you know exactly what you're getting first.
customer_reviews.author: April A.

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I like the photos, usability of the camera and its looks. What I didn't like was that within a year of buying it I started having trouble getting it to turn on. The zoom would emerge, but no image showed on the screen, and then it wouldn't recede back into the camera. Usually some fiddling with the batteries would help, but it makes the camera unreliable. I looked up this model online and found a lot of people have had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this. Save up your money a little longer ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera was rather slow and the video quality was sub-par. Would not recommend this. Save up your money a little longer and purchase a quiality camera. I wish I did.
customer_reviews.author: TimBolda

customer_reviews.title: Horrible decision...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this camera for four years, I might get one out of ten pictures that is good quality and not blurry. I have changed and tried every setting, and read numerous tips on forums. Sadly, many people have said that the sensor is far too small for the large megapixels and zoom. I gave up, save your money and buy a better camera. Don't be wooed by the megapixels and zoom like I was. Now I just use my phone
customer_reviews.author: Jay L. Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing. It has way too many settings for what I need but the picture quality is amazing. I picked this camera because of the pixel to price ratio. Even without the flash, if there is some light, I can take a picture of my dark yard and the tree looks illuminated like 10AM. Focus to actual taking the picture is a bit slow but according to other reviewers I will get faster at that as I get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: V Sansonetti

customer_reviews.title: I may never buy Nikon again.
customer_reviews.text: Nikon at one time had good low end cameras. Well this camera is ok but that is about all cheap built no frills basic or less than basic camera better to add more money and buy a more advanced model. Fujifilm cameras in the same price range are twice as good. This camera has no view finder and it is very slow at focusing and at a distance it won't focus at all. It don't feel good in my grip and that to me is very important. I won't send it back I don't want someone else to get it so I plan to smack it with a big rock. It's that junky!!
customer_reviews.author: Five-o

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix
customer_reviews.text: This camera came recommended by my sister. I was at a concert last year and was snapping pictures right and left. My friends saw the pics on Facebook and were wondering if I took these from the stage. No, the zoom is clear and fantastic, Both friends got the same camera from Amazon as a gift from their spouse. I have taken pictures in my garden this summer and they turned out great. The camera is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sorella Luna

customer_reviews.title: Too Slow
customer_reviews.text: If you are used to a digital camera with fast processing time, then do not buy this. It is way too slow for my taste. I also do not like the focusing time it takes for this camera to take a picture. The skin softening application is not that great either. Overall, I would not recommend this camera. I was swayed by some of the good reviews, but it is not to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: JJ21

customer_reviews.title: and I have taken some pretty exceptional photos with it of birds and other wildlife
customer_reviews.text: This was my first step up from a very basic point and shoot, and I have taken some pretty exceptional photos with it of birds and other wildlife. The zoom is pretty awesome for a point and shoot, but naturally loses some of the sharpness if zoom is too far extended. It does very well taking close-ups of food and flowers with bright clear colors. I think it's a really good value - especially for the inexperienced photographer who wants to take great photos.
customer_reviews.author: patti

customer_reviews.title: Sharpness at medium and close ranges
customer_reviews.text: It takes a lot of experimentation to get the sharpness expected from a Nikon camera, I have yet to get good results. This is my fourth digital camera, after many years of shooting film (35 & 120). My next try will be with a tripod w/o vibration minimizer, which may interfere with sharp focus. Mostly, I shoot outdoors (no flash) and some macro. No portrait yet, nor best of 10 mode or auto smile finder.
customer_reviews.author: David G. DiLucca

customer_reviews.title: Nikon user for life!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality camera for the price. I bought it for my daughter and she uses it all the time. Perfect camera for learning. I believe it's better to take steps in cameras. If you have equipment you aren't able to use it's a waste. By the time you learn it a new version of that camera will be out. Love Nikon!
customer_reviews.author: Hiker4life

customer_reviews.title: A rare Nikon misstep
customer_reviews.text: I bough this for my wife to use and carry in her purse for simple shots with our family. It takes terrific picture but must be designed by battery manufacturers. Batteries last one day of minimal shooting. Don't buy this. I tried rechargeable too but experienced the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Major focus issues
customer_reviews.text: At first glance seems to be great camera for the money. It's capable of taking excellent pictures, but they are few and far between. Has major focusing issues and 90 percent of pictures taken come out blurry. The 10 percent that are not blurry are very nice. My wife and I have taken at least 2000 pictures with this and have been so let down. Would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Casedawg

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. It is perfect for the person who wants a good point and shoot camera. I usually leave mine set on automatic as I chase the grandkids trying to get them still long enough for a clear shot. But for the person who likes to try different settings, it has a lot of them. Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: I like the camera and it's features
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera and it's features, but the compartment to put the batteries in & to retrieve the card is very difficult to open. I've tried so many times to open it and I get very frustrated. So until they change this defect I'll buy something else the next time. Some things are important to some people and this is important to me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pina

customer_reviews.title: No viewfinder
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to buy this camera for the price but have been disappointed in the performance. I would have done just as well to buy another Canon powershot, which worked well for me for years. This has no features that I didn't have in my old camera. I dislike the way that it takes so long before I can take a second photo. It is nearly worthless indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Sara F.

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera but I will say from the different views I've read it is a difficult camera to use. Once I've read all the instructions for the camera and used it. I have no real complaints. I took the camera On a resent fishing trip in Montana,the pictures I took turned out great. It doesn't take a Rocket Scientist To figure it out! Like any thing you buy today! Read the Manual, it helps
customer_reviews.author: James R. Wildnauer

customer_reviews.title: Great For My Needs
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon CoolPix is a decent but basic camera. I bought it more for still life than action shots so it is fine for me. I do notice it takes longer to focus and shoot than the Sony Cybershot I bought for my son. I like the sharpness and quality of my photographs and for my purposes, this is a really good camera. I would not buy it for sports or action shots though.
customer_reviews.author: Aalea1

customer_reviews.title: Ok camera
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is blurry in a lot of pictures. It is easy to learn how to use, small to carry but pictures are not that great.
customer_reviews.author: C plyter

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Nikon camera and so far I love it. It is easy to use and is one step above a point and shoot. Just what I wanted. It is simple enough for my daughter to use it too. She will be using it to take her pictures for her 4H Photography entry. She usually takes about 1200 pictures prior to submission so I am looking forward to seeing how this camera performs.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Not for me....
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty finicky when it comes to cameras. This was my first Nikon purchase and I just don't like it. You have to hold this camera very still in order to get a clear pic. It's almost too lightweight for me, bounces around too easily. Do not like that you need to open cap to review pictures. Gave this to my husband and bought another CanonPower which I have always been happy with.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: This is last years model, the 820 replaced it. This 810 is still high quality for a really nice zoom point and shoot. Takes AA batteries so you can always get them. Never run out of charge and can't find a charger time. Replaces a much simpler camera. Great glass in the lense and take decent 720p video.
customer_reviews.author: M. Urso

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, great service.
customer_reviews.text: The camera arrived swiftly and I couldn't wait to get home the day it was delivered. I've had it for about a month now and it's been great! Definitely use the manual open flash in darker situations, but if you don't, it creates these neat surreal photos. So far, it is only a little wonky in the super bright daylight. It's just a bit washed out -- but all photos are. Great camera!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this camera for a few weeks and I love it. Takes great pictures near and far. Easy to use in auto or manual mode. Looking forward to taking it on vacation in a few weeks to Canada & New England. UPDATE: Thoroughly enjoyed using this camera on our recent cruise. Versatile, easy to use, and great pix. Battery life was better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Red Dog

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty much loving it so far.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried the video feature yet. But for the most part, the photos all come out great. Low light is good, but sometimes it's a bit of a miss. It struggles to focus every so often. But for the price that I got it, I'm totally in love. Be forewarned, it does not come with a memory card. So don't expect to start taking photos right out of the box unless you buy one with it.
customer_reviews.author: @TheContrActorLA

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the product. The picture quality was low grade and the shuttle button would stick. I like the size and the way it fit my hand. My brother has one and I was impressed with the camera, however this item's performance was bad. I believe it was a defective item. I also missed the added view finder that is found in other models.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great camera alternative to DSLR
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting to upgrade my camera from my puny point and shoots that were overpriced and not that good. We didn't have the budget for a DSLR and didn't want to keep in the rut of the puny P&S's. This is a great option! The zoom and clarity is great. It's easy to operate and takes great pictures. I am very pleased with this camera and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: WDG

customer_reviews.title: Different than last...
customer_reviews.text: So far, I like this camera. However, I will say that I miss my Nikon Coolpix that was a touch screen. I believe once I continue to use and learn the in/outs of this camera, the pictures will definitely be better than my last Nikon. The pictures that I have taken thus far are not bad but I kind of expected more since this camera has more zoom options than my last camera. In due time, I will get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for stills & landscapes
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to upgrade my old coolpix from 10 to 16MP. Wow... what a difference. This is by far the best quality camera I've ever owned. It takes amazing close ups (which i do a lot) and landscapes. This is not a great camera for action, bc sometimes you have to take the picture more than once. The video is decent quaility too! For the money, it is a great camera!
customer_reviews.author: cupcake_queen

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera I ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this camera. Zoom is great, easy to use, pictures came out better than I thought. Just love it. It came in just as we were getting ready to go away on vacation for several weeks. Found that it was light enough to carry everywhere we went, pictures were quick enough to use at sporting events and finally worked just fine for portrait type shots as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera - so far
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is a great camera. Small enough to not be cumbersome - large enough that you can actually push the buttons with your finger and not have to resort to a stylus. The zoom takes beautifully clear pictures. Love the red color - makes it different than most. I've only just started using it, so nothing bad to say yet.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Martens

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: A great little camera for the money. I'm taking it to Europe in a few weeks. It's much easier to handle than a full size Nikon and a heck of a lot better price. I won't completely lose my mind if it gets lost. I was way too nervous on my previous trip with my niece's D3100. Highly recommended. It responds quickly and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Steele

customer_reviews.title: nikon quality
customer_reviews.text: daughter was taking photography class, this camera was far and away the best for the price , Nikon lenses are the best on the market, even my professional photographer friend was impressed , even his non, Nikon cameras have Nikon lenses , best glass there is if your new to photography, buy nikon
customer_reviews.author: steve moseley

customer_reviews.title: Nikon coolpix L810 camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is fantastic it takes really clear pictures, and I'm sure my husband and Daughter in Law will be happy to get these cameras For Christmas. They will be surprised at the quality and length this camera can go.Wonderful pictures taken by this camera and I was just testing them to be sure they worked. And they can do so much more.
customer_reviews.author: CJRR

customer_reviews.title: For the next generation photographer, which I am not.
customer_reviews.text: Very savvy camera, however, it is heavy and awkward. I dropped mine twice, and that was all she wrote, folks. I switched to a Kodak Easyshare Digital Camera and have had the same quality photos without all the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: marlene whtn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The camera is so cool but, it function with AA batteries, does not have DC charger.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap, don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 1 year. Sent back to Nikon for repair and even though it was just over a year since purchase they would not honor warranty. Piece of crap, don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Zahn

customer_reviews.title: Good camera; easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to upgrade from previous small digital cameras, and the main feature I wanted was the zoom. The camera does not disappoint, and is a good value. Sometimes it is a little slow to focus and shoot in low light conditions if it is on the automatic setting. There are lots of scene choices, though, and a good flash. The zoom, which is what I really wanted, is great. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Koeppe

customer_reviews.title: Poor indoor and video sucks, plus loud zoom
customer_reviews.text: I love the zoom, and it takes great outdoor pics, but it is loud and doesn't do well indoors. The worst thing, is that you cannot take a video that is over 29+ minutes long. This is bullcrap!!! Nikon, get your crap in order!!! You use to be the best!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS CAMERA!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best I have ever had! It takes great pics, and the video quality is FABULOUS!!! I bought this as a gift to myself (Dec. 2012), and I am soooo happy that I did! I especially LOVE that now I can ZOOM in without blur at my son's annual winter concerts; makes me feel as if I am up close and personal. Hahaha!! This is a really great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Vee Daniels

customer_reviews.title: A good camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a good camera. It has only one problem which I do not like. It takes a lot of time to focus on a subject. By the time it focuses I have lost the moment which I wanted to capture. It is slow to respond to a subject. The pictures are very clear. The videos can be spotty with the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Basil

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for starters
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a camera semi profesional under my budget. I got this camera and I started taking pictures. The zoom is great but you need a lot of time focusing. I thought it was faster taking pictures but I have to wait between one picture and another. (Don't like this part) I recommend this camera for people who start in the photo hobbie. The pixels are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Katty

customer_reviews.title: I bought this camera as an upgrade to my Nikon ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as an upgrade to my Nikon COOLPIX L100. I absolutely Ioved my COOLPIX L100, and was excited to get my COOLPIX L810. This camera has a 26x mega zoom with point and shoot option, but I found that it was often times very hard to take a clear picture. I understand that it has a lot of features and the user manual helps you learn how to use these added features, but I still had trouble getting clarity with the point and shoot option.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Not for the pro
customer_reviews.text: This item is consistent with previous reviews. Has a lot of great features for the price but I have experienced some issues with focus as well. I long for control like I had in the old days when I focused the lens myself. I see very little difference in all the mode settings and just stay on one or two for convenience. Not Nikon's best but great camera for the price. I'm still a Nikonian.
customer_reviews.author: David W Seymour

customer_reviews.title: SHe had enjoyed immensely and taken many great photos
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for teen daughter who requested a camera as her gift. SHe had enjoyed immensely and taken many great photos. Her favorite thing to do is go on hikes and take beautiful photos of the scenery. Good all-around camera.
customer_reviews.author: Spinoza's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fine, fine, fine, camera.
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy a DSLR, either Nikon or Canon, but I didn't want to carry around a clunker like that. So, I stumbled on this little guy with a big zoom lens, and it's all I need. It takes great pictures. And I only paid $150 for it (used). No warranty, but at $150, I don't have to worry too much about the investment. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon Coolpix L819 is a great camera. Pictures come out beautifully. Just don't expect to snap pictures in quick succession. This is not a problem for me since I'm more interested in capturing the item being photographed rather than into simultaneous pictures or rapid succession pictures as if taking pictures of small active children, one after another. Great focus, easy transferring to PC for sharing with friends.
customer_reviews.author: VAtransplant

customer_reviews.title: Back to a nikon
customer_reviews.text: Have a N1001 35mm but it's hard getting pics printed. So this was the logical move. Not easy determining that you needed ONLY Nikon batteries (on a trip, bought what the book said was ok batteries, spent hours trying to get the camera to turn on.) but once I got the Nikon batteries, camera lives up to its hype.
customer_reviews.author: ruff livin'

customer_reviews.title: I DONT LIKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: The video was amazing... looks nicer outside because of the heavy lighting... but... pictures sucks so bad!!! I wanted to return it... but It's alright... but not the pictures they don't look better then my 50 dollar camera from sony... geez I guess I'll use it for recording and use my other for pictures... :p
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I just got the Nikon Coolpix L810 and I love it. It shipped fast I had it in 3 days. So much bang for the buck. I highly recommend this easy to use attractive camera. It is lightweight and takes great pics, even in low light. the 26x zoom is such a great added bonus on this camera. I give it two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Perez

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this camera!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased this camera to go on our honeymoon to Alaska. We are glad we did. We wanted something that took great pictures, without needing a huge camera to tote around. This camera delivered! It takes amazing pictures, and it is very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Romeu

customer_reviews.title: was good for a while then stoped working
customer_reviews.text: i got this camera and i was soo excited; started using it and i was sooo dissaapointed! when i take a picture it looks sooo bad i couldnt even describe it. I used it for maybe 4 special ocations and now it doesnt work! i was sooo carefull with it! im really mad
customer_reviews.author: Marco G

customer_reviews.title: Blurry Pictures, Faded Appearing
customer_reviews.text: Most all pictures taken with the Camera were faded as well as blurred appearing, some appeared to look as if person taking them was nervous and shakey. I am not entirely pleased with it and may send it back if Amazon will exchange it. I have had the Camera about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Alice-- Waycross, Ga.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Nikon Coolpix!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the Nikon Coolpix camera! We've had it for some time now and I love the great zoom, as well as the ease of use. My husband is a bird lover, and he can take great pictures of his feathery friends with it. :-) It can be a point and shoot, or you can make a more advanced camera with all the adjustments. A great all-around camera for us!
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: The package was OK, but inside the camera box was opened. The camera was not a brand new since it had some evidencies of use, including some pictures, the zoom didn't work at all and the shooter button didn't work neither. I asked Amazon for a refund, this is the first time that this happened to me with a Amazon's product, but this is certainly a product in bad conditions. They shouldn't offer products like that.
customer_reviews.author: vittosomer

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a few weeks now and I absolutely love it. The zoom on the camera is what I was looking for in the first place and this one definitely delivers. I've had no issues with the lens breaking or anything like that. So right now it's a great camera and I hope it stays that way!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is excellent! I got it as a graduation gift about 2 months ago and I am already taking great pictures and making memories! As a college student who will be studying abroad, this camera is ideal! It's a professional camera for non-professionals! It is so lightweight and the fact that it is battery operated makes it ideal for those always on the go! I would recommend this camera to anyone! The only down side to this camera is that I haven't figured out if you can change the shutter speed, because sometimes the camera takes it's time to snap the shot.
customer_reviews.author: Bestbuddy50

customer_reviews.title: Great Zoom
customer_reviews.text: I just got this camera today, so I obviously can't speak for its durability/longevity. From what I have done, though, it seems great! The zoom is fantastic and the screen is so clear. Even in low light without flash the pictures seem quite clean and clear. I can't wait to use it more! Love!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: I am a Nikon convert!
customer_reviews.text: My first Nikon camera and I am definitely a convert. I love taking movies and completed an hour-long video for a class assignment and made an A in it! Hooray! Also digital photos are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: great pictures
customer_reviews.text: We got this after havnig a digital camera that finally gave up after 10 years. This takes really good pictures but we have had to send it into Nikon for repair for it not focusing properly and it kept giving an error message. It was still under warranty so they are taking care of it.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Skena

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for outdoor use. The large zoom lets you get really close, much closer than any camera I owned before. There are features on the camera I have not used yet..... and may never use. But still, it's nice to have them in case. I like this NIKON!
customer_reviews.author: Howard Ash

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: This camera is ok for still photography. The shutter speed is appaling and picture quality isn't that great, so I wouldn't recommend it to people who are going to be taking pictures of kids. My droid razr takes better pictures, and the shutter speed is way faster. But considering the price, the camera is what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: Broke in Less than 100 photos
customer_reviews.text: The camera has nice features, but mine died after less than 100 pictures. Unfortunately, the warranty ran out, so I can't get it fixed without spending a lot of money. This is very disappointing as I was in the middle of an Alaskan vacation when it happened. I can't recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The camera was used once and then the lens got stuck and would not open or close....
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for Amateur Photographers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend who wanted to get into photography and get away from the more simplistic point and shoot style cameras. This is a great first step without going into the larger, more expensive, devices and having to worry about lenses and such. For those that have been trained or are more professional this may not be a great option due to the lack of view finder and some refinement of lenses, etc. Other than that it is a great camera with simplistic use such as regular AA batteries, large vibrant screen, and great steady shot mode.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a christmas present for my GF who is starting out with a intrest in takiing pictures. Nice clean camera that takes clear nice pictures and is a step up from the cheaper ones out there. Stepping stone to a more involved camera that Im sure is comming soon. Great camera for the money
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: is easy to use and it is really powerful, I love this camera. It have a simplify menu, a very nice resolution and an excellent zoom, the battery level is awesome, I have more than 3 days using this camera and I do not have the necessity to recharge the batteries, it is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Ruben M.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the best
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself is pretty handy. Small enough to carry around and to take family pictures. There are many settings and it takes awhile to get used to them. Since I bought a memory chip with mine, I was able to take many pictures without memory problems. The batteries that come with the camera lasts pretty long. I love the camera and I can see myself carrying it to every event that I go to from now on.
customer_reviews.author: True

customer_reviews.title: This camera is great!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great. The pics are clean and full of detail!! video is good also, of course, you need a large memory chip to get long video. It is fairly user friendly, learning curve is not to high. Always read manual and play with it. Battery life is good, even using flash. I like it..
customer_reviews.author: Grillem

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the quality and clarity of this camera! Especially for the price. I would easily pay $300 USD for a camera with such great zoom and quality. I have impressed many professional photographers with pictures from this camera! If you haven't bought this camera, do it! And if you have, great choice! :D P.S. If you look in the customer photos, I posted a few under the name of "evan."
customer_reviews.author: evan

customer_reviews.title: L810
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Nikon quality. Good quality works well. My two negatives are. This camera does not have a viewfinder. Thought I could do without it. I was wrong. Can't see the screen in bright light. Number two the extreme zoom forces me back to using a tripod. The image stabilization won't help here.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hippeli

customer_reviews.title: Only 4 star
customer_reviews.text: This a good basic camera with nice zoom hove ever some response take while with this comers and if you try to record movie with it will record the sound of the zoom. Please make sure when you buying this remember this is fully automatic camera so your input is minimal .
customer_reviews.author: Branislav Piacek

customer_reviews.title: great price good camera be careful buying used
customer_reviews.text: Very good for used condition the one I got had a small scratch in the lenses wish I knew that before buying it but it doesn't effect photos too much. Overall an awesome camera for this price. Takes great pictures
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: never buy a camera on the internet
customer_reviews.text: Zoom control is clunky and jerky... auto focus is a joke. picture quality when it is in focus is OK. Purchased because I expected better from the brand name and because it uses AA batteries instead of those god-awful proprietary in-camera rechargeable expensive to replace batteries...
customer_reviews.author: K. Edw Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Good one, but...
customer_reviews.text: I used to own a simple digital camera and I decided to replace it with this one. I found that Nikon COOLPIX L810 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 26x Zoom NIKKOR ED... 1. is a good one with a tripod only - a small shake will result in a blurred image. 2. I see that it takes more time to save the taken image and get back to a position to take the next picture. There is a slight delay. One thing I need to say, I got the camera three weeks ahead of the original 'expected' shipping time. I am still learning - may be I will learn to love it more eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Briju

customer_reviews.title: Amaazing , dont event hesitate
customer_reviews.text: This camera was amazing , i hesitateed to buy it but i just went for it and i want all of you who are undecicive on which you should get it or not to just go for it . It is lightweight has great hd quality and the focus is nice once you get the hang of it , which is what i found most people complaining about . Although it doesnt have the most exaggerated focus but it focuses and comes out professionally . and for the price ? , what a deal . And my mother thought this was a $600 camera , well its just amazing go ahead and try yourself ! (:
customer_reviews.author: Cel

customer_reviews.title: Battery Didn't Last Long
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last very long. Battery wouldn't last but a handful of pictures after awhile. By the time it started doing this, it was past warranty. We barely used it and now had to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond Garrett

customer_reviews.title: GREAT EXPERIENCE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product on a Saturday night and received it from the seller Tuesday morning. It was easy to start up, the manual had a lot of good tips, and my pictures are coming out very clear. I would recommend this stylish camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne K. Dresner

customer_reviews.title: Nikon
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this camera. I have had 2 digital cameras in the last 10 years. The first one my husband paid over 600.00 for. I was hooked on this camera. I bought the exact one on ebay a couple of years ago as a backup. I finally decided it was time for a new camera. I did some research and found this Nikon. Everything about it I love. The batteries are lasting forever. I use it for ebay sales, we took it on vacation and took over 100 pictures plus videos. The batteries still read strong. So that being said I have nothing at all bad to say about this camera......My daughter kept saying I want this...
customer_reviews.author: wfr1956

customer_reviews.title: My Nikon Coolpix L810
customer_reviews.text: I have been thoroughly enjoying this camera. It's easy to use and as long as I wait for the center bracket to turn green, my shots are in focus. You can use it as a point in shoot or go to manual mode. There are many scene choices too. It's also very unique in red!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: coolpix 810 nikkon digital camera
customer_reviews.text: nice camera, good pictures, you have to read the book to run it-if you don't use it often enough to memorize it, though. good zoom, i need to be able to get pictures out in the middle of the rodeo arena, i need to get quick shots, and closeups of the grandprincess, so i'm ready.
customer_reviews.author: dawn rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Excelent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excelent product. When arrives at my country arrives in a verry good backpack and very secured, the camera is excellent. I didnt find any problem in it and its amazing, it works very quickly and it takes excelent pictures and records video verry good. For me is 4 stars!!!. About the attention of the store that i bought is excellent, because i sent a email asking for a thing and they answer me in 30 minutes!!. Excellent attention and very good product.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Bagnulo

customer_reviews.title: Upgrading my older camera
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this model and loves it. I wanted a camera with a lot of optical zoom and more mps than my old camera. I will begin using it Christmas. I use my camera for taking reference shots for oil paintings. The zoom lets me get closeups without going to the computer. I just print them out and they're ready to paint. The only thing I would improve on it the 3" viewing screen. There is no protection for it, no cover like my old camera had.
customer_reviews.author: H.K.W.

customer_reviews.title: just great
customer_reviews.text: The perfect gift for someone who likes taking photos. Its light weight and its compact so its great for someone with small hands. Photo quality is great and with optic zoom you cant go wrong. Its a great buy and it ships fast.
customer_reviews.author: J Xtreme

customer_reviews.title: nikon L810
customer_reviews.text: what a great little camera. video is great. i am not sorry that i spent money on this little master. the price was good for the product. considering another one in red...... you will not go wrong here. thanks amazon for prompt delivery. great stuff...
customer_reviews.author: scanman

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX L810 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 26x Zoom NIKKOR ED Glass Lens and 3-inch LCD (Red) (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description:
Color:RedFROM THE MANUFACTURER



The COOLPIX L810, with its incredible image quality, great zoom range and ease-of-use, will bring you photographic enjoyment for years to come. The 26x zoom captures high-resolution images, shot after shot for a broad variety of views—22.5mm wide-angle landscapes to 585mm telephoto shots, capturing action near or far. Enhance the moment and start recording HD (720p) movies with stereo sound at the touch of a button. Plus, L810 uses AA batteries, so you're never waiting for a recharge.Supplied Accessories: LC-CP25 Lens Cap, AN-CP21 Strap, UC-E16 USB Cable, EG-CP16 Audio Video Cable, Four AA Alkaline Batteries and NikonView NX 2 CD-ROM.


GO THE DISTANCE
VERSATILE 26X OPTICAL ZOOM
An incredible 26x optical Zoom-NIKKOR glass lens (22.5-585mm) with optical VR Image Stabilization brings sharp focus to images taken when you can't get close. Capture stills and movies with 26x optical zoom versatility. A side zoom lever facilitates your control over the optical zoom. The optical VR Image Stabilization minimizes the effects of blur.

HD MOVIES IN AN INSTANT
HD (720P) MOVIES WITH STEREO SOUND
With a touch of the dedicated movie record button, you can instantly begin recording amazing HD (720p) movies utilizing the power and scope of the L810's 26x optical zoom. Sound is automatically recorded in stereo. When you want to view your movies on the big screen, the built-in HDMI port makes it easy.

EASY VIEWING, INDOORS OR OUT
BRILLIANT 3.0-INCH LCD MONITOR
Frame and share your stills and movies on the large and sharp 3.0-inch LCD color monitor. Its ultra-high-resolution monitor featuring 921,000 dots shows every detail to precision. Anti-glare coating provides easy viewing of photos and HD movies.



CREATIVITY INSPIRED
COLOR YOUR WORLD ANY SHADE YOU LIKE
Try something new and shoot either stills or movies in different colors such as Nostalgic Sepia for an old fashioned look or black and white for a vintage feel. You can also choose various color options such as Standard, Vivid or Cyanotype. Add a touch of creativity to your next photo or movie project.

KEEP IT SIMPLE OR SIMPLY SHOOT
EASY AUTO AND A HOST OF SCENE MODES
Keep it simple. Let the camera determine the best settings for the job with Easy Auto Mode, including pre-programmed settings for Portrait, Night Portrait, Landscape, Night Landscape and Close-up. When set, the camera will automatically recognize the scene and optimize the camera settings to capture the best shot.



MAKE EVERYONE LOOK GREAT
Use Nikon's Smart Portrait System with Smile Timer, a mode that automatically recognizes when a subject is smiling. Also included are Blink Warning and Red-Eye Fix™. Use the Skin Softening feature to perfect complexion imperfections.




NEW 3D PHOTOGRAPHY
The L810 is capable of 3D still image photography. Enjoy viewing these still images simply by connecting to a 3D HDTV using the camera's HDMI port.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars857 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
